clustifyr: Classifier for Single-cell RNA-seq Using Cell Clusters

Source: R/clustifyR-package.R
clustifyr-package.Rd

Classify cells from single-cell RNA sequencing data using external reference data (e.g., bulk RNA-seq).

See also

  • http://github.com/rnabioco/clustifyr#readme
